steps.name: Face Analyzer by Each AI by Each AI by Each AI by Each AI by Each AI by Each AI
Face Analyzer by Each AI by Each AI by Each AI by Each AI by Each AI by Each AI

params.prompt: Generate a hyper-realistic portrait of a newborn baby based on an ultrasound image, preserving the exact pose, angle, and proportions of the original scan. The baby’s skin tone authentically reflects a natural blend of both the mother’s {{step1.output.race}} and the father’s {{step2.output.race}} heritage, harmonizing these tones to create a soft, warm complexion. The baby’s delicate facial features—including closed eyes, a gentle mouth, and subtle hand position—closely mirror those seen in the ultrasound. Soft, diffused lighting enhances fine textures on the baby’s skin, adding depth and realism. The softly blurred, neutral background focuses all attention on the baby’s peaceful, newborn expression, capturing an authentic transformation from the ultrasound to a lifelike, tender portrait
Smiling newborn baby with eyes closed
